name: Suspicious MSHTA Process Patterns
query: (process.executable.text:*\\mshta.exe AND ((process.parent.executable.text:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) OR process.command_line.text:(*\\AppData\\Local* OR *C\:\\Windows\\Temp* OR *C\:\\Users\\Public*)) OR (NOT ((process.executable.text:(C\:\\Windows\\System32* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64*)) OR (process.command_line.text:(*.htm* OR *.hta*) AND process.command_line.text:(*mshta.exe OR *mshta))))))
author: Florian Roth
